NetFPGA : Summer Camp Scholarship Application

Click here to view or print this page without frames
A limited number of scholarships are available for students or instructors from schools unable to cover registration and hotel expenses. Award of the scholarships will be based on both merit and need. If you are able to cover the expenses of the event through your existing grants and contracts, then please complete the standard, on-line registration form. If you are not able to cover the expenses and would like to apply for one of the very limited scholarships, please complete the the essays below.

  • If you are awarded this scholarship, what will you contribute to the project?

  • Please provide a full paragraph that describes your relevant technical background in networking and/or hardware design.

  • Please provide a full paragraph that explains why you or your host institution needs financial help. Why is it that that existing grants, contracts, or departmental funds cannot pay for this event?

  • Additional Comments or Requirements:

  • Information about yourself If you wish to provide information about yourself, enter your contact data below.
